name: A thick leather and gold girdle
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence a tiny bit.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'kick'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
The Golden Girdle modifies its user's skills.
